english.segment1: Our Father Holy is your name. The universe declares Your fame. Your people singing out Your praise. For your glory come set our hearts ablaze
english.segment2: That the world may see. that you alone are King
english.segment3: YOUR NAME, YOUR RENOWN. ALL OVER TOWN, ALL OVER THIS WORLD. YOUR KINGDOM COME. YOUR GLORY, HALLELUJAH. KING FOREVER, JESUS IS THE LORD. YOUR KINGDOM COME
english.segment4: Revival in the streets today. come Lord Jesus have Your way. You say if My people. if they would only pray. Turn from sin and humbly seek My face
english.segment5: Then I would hear their prayer. and come and heal their land. God come and heal our land. Revival everywhere
english.segment6: Your kingdom come Your will be done. on the earth as it is in heaven
english.segment7: Amen, Amen. On the earth as it is in heaven. World without end. On the earth as it is in heaven. Praises in the air. On the earth as it is in heaven. Your fame everywhere. On the earth as it is in heaven. On the earth as it is in heaven. On the earth as it is in heaven
